Today in Gower, conditions are poor with 8 ft @10s WSW swell and fresh 27 mph SW winds making it blown out. Tomorrow sees a slight improvement with 6 ft @10s WSW swell and moderate 14 mph S winds, offering some workable options at spots like Llangennith Beach. The day after brings better conditions with 5 ft @12s WSW swell and light 9 mph NW winds, making for clean surf at various beaches. Best: day after.
